Description: United International Transportation (known as: Budget Saudi) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since September 2007. Budget Saudi operates within the Transportation sector focusing on Trucking. It has Companies operating across India and Saudi Arabia, working on Trucking and IT Consulting and Other Services. Budget Saudi is based in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia and was established in December 1978.
